amendment.description: To make available, from funds appropriated for operation and maintenance, Defense-wide, up to $2,000,000 for the establishment, in consultation with the Reach Out and Read National Center, of a pilot project on pediatric early literacy on military installations.

action.text: Amendment SA 1981 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Chambliss.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1981 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
